Package neureka.backend.api.operations

Class OperationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • neureka.backend.api.operations.OperationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class OperationContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    PATTERN : Singleton (But cloneable for testing purposes!) This class initializes and stores OperationType instances in various data structures for fast access and querying. (Mostly used by the FunctionParser) Every OperationType instance contains a default ThreadLocal reference to the same OperationContext instance, namely: The _INSTANCE variable as declared below. During class initialization concrete classes extending the OperationType class are being instantiated in the static block below.
